title: Portfolio
name: Harshita Sharma
abouts: Hi, I’m Harshita Sharma, a passionate MERN Stack Developer with a strong foundation in web development, UI/UX design, and scalable applications.

I enjoy building intuitive and impactful digital experiences, focusing on both frontend aesthetics and backend efficiency.Beyond coding, I have a keen interest in AI, startups, and problem-solving. Whether it’s crafting seamless user experiences or optimizing backend performance, I love tackling challenges and bringing ideas to life.

projects.name: My-Wealth
projects.description: My Wealth is a finance app for tracking income, expenses, and spending patterns with AI insights, built using Next.js and Prisma.

projects.name: Foodio
projects.description: Foodio is a MERN-stack food ordering platform with seamless ordering, pre-order reservations, secure payments, and an admin portal for efficient management.

projects.name: HerVenture
projects.description: HerVenture is a platform that helps women entrepreneurs hire skilled workers, connect with wholesalers, and find business spaces—all in a secure and inclusive environment.
